text: Activision is an American video game company. It was the first third party in the industry's history. It was founded on October 1, 1979. On July 9, 2008, it merged with Vivendi to make a new company called Activision Blizzard. Activision is best known for Tony Hawk's Pro Skater, Call of Duty, and Guitar Hero. ==References== Category:Video game companies of the United States Category:1979 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in Santa Monica, California
title: Activision
